warmup.content:
# Warmup

Today's warmup is the main lesson.

Check out the **[SQL Reference](#sql-reference)** page for more info on how to perform DB actions needed in the practice below...

## Repo
Please download **[this](https://github.com/mottaquikarim/nycda_lecture39_sql_practice)** repo, which you will need to solve the problems defined below.

1. migration file initial create
2. inserts thru api
3. selections via console
4. selections via api

## Exercise 1
